question: When I share something with you—my personal details or sensitive information—can I trust that it stays between us?
response:
### Answer

Yes, you can trust that the information you share with us, including your personal details or sensitive information, is kept private. We take your privacy and security very seriously and have designed our platform to comply with all relevant privacy laws. We have implemented security protocols to protect your personal information.

For more detailed information, please read our [Privacy Policy](https://joinvoy.zendesk.com/hc/en-gb/articles/20199558930196-Is-the-information-I-share-with-you-private).

If you have any further questions or need additional support, please don't hesitate to reach out to our customer care:

- **Live Chat**: Contact us via chat from your account (Mon-Fri - 09:00am - 17:00pm). Response Time: 2 minutes
- **Email**: Contact us at help@joinvoy.com. Response Time: 24 hours
- **Phone**: Call us at 020 3912 9885 (Mo-Fr 09:00-17:00). Response times may vary, press 2 if you'd like us to call you back once you're at the front of the queue

We're here to ensure you have everything you need to continue your weight loss journey successfully.
